content: this quick baby cardigan is created by crocheting two hexagons folding them and seaming them together though the pattern is written for worsted weight yarn it can easily be modified for heavier or lighter weight yarns also by increasing the number of rounds the pattern can be made larger to accommodate older children the pattern includes options for cuffs at the ends of the sleeves and a way to lengthen the jacket there are charts as well as a photo tutorial at the end of the pattern if you would like to conserve ink when printing do not print the last two pages since they contain the pictures
